# EXEBlock Knowledge Base : EVM Smart Contract testing

Obtain chain id

```text
curl --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "get_chain_properties", "params": [], "id": 1}' http://127.0.0.1:8090/rpc && echo
```

Run CLI wallet

```text
programs/cli_wallet/cli_wallet --wallet-file my-wallet.json --chain-id {chain id} --server-rpc-endpoint ws://127.0.0.1:8090 -u '' -p ''
unlock supersecret
```

Create a contract

```text
create_contract nathan BTS "" 0 1 1000000 true true
```

**Hello World**

```text
create_contract nathan BTS "" 0 1 1000000 true true
```

Check that the contract has been created

```text
get_all_contracts
```

Calling a contract function

call\_contract nathan 1.16.0 "addf3804" 0 1 1000000 true true

Check the change of the contract's variable

call\_contract\_no\_changing\_state 1.16.0 nathan BTS "853255cc"

Check contract balance

list\_id\_balances 1.16.0

Credit contract with funds

call\_contract nathan 1.16.0 "" 123 1 1000000 true true

Get contract balance again

list\_id\_balances 1.16.0
